module.name: ets_affiliatemarketing
module.displayName: Loyalty, referral and affiliate program (reward points)
module.description: Allows customers to earn rewards (points or cash) when they buy, sell or refer new customers to your website. Includes 3 marketing programs: Loyalty, Referral and Affiliate programs to boost your sales and customers.
module.author: ETS-Soft
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall?
